content: Non-Able is tied up during the first half of the fight and is unable to use his hands. For that portion of the fight, you will mainly contend with stomp and kick-based attacks. During the second half of the fight, however, Non-Able tears his ropes, freeing his hands and widening his move pool.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Able_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Able Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-Able Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Non-Able is tied up during the first half of the fight and is unable to use his hands. For that portion of the fight, you will mainly contend with stomp and kick-based attacks. During the second half of the fight, however, Non-Able tears his ropes, freeing his hands and widening his move pool.
